CustomField.description: Thisis an indicator to track if this is an application that was created by the Applicant (i.e.external) vs. application created by an IMIT Administrator (i.e Internal)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Thisis an indicator to track if this is an application that was created by the Applicant (i.e.external) vs. application created by an IMIT Administrator (i.e Internal)
CustomField.label: Application submitted by?
